page.title: 18"My Choice of Clothes"
page.content:
I like wearing jeans.They are a pair of trousers made of denim which is a hard-wearing material. I like skirts as well. My favourite colours on my clothes are red white and blue. I would like to have a denim skirt which is like a pair of jeans but it is a skirt instead. I like jumpers which are made of wool. I like tee-shirts and I would like a tee-shirt with a picture of Paul Young on it. Paul Young is a pop singer. I like ankle boots and I have got a pair of them. I have got two pairs of trainers which I wear on my feet when I go out to play or when I go running.
{written by Lynne Arthur {girl aged 10}
